decoder.name: junos-ids-ip-spoofing
decoder.regex: (\.+) (\S+) - (\S+) [\S+ attack-name="(\.+)" source-address="(\S+)" destination-address="(\S+)" protocol-id="(\S+)" source-zone-name="(\S+)" interface-name="(\S+)" action="(\S+)"]
decoder.order: firewall_name, cat, sub_cat, attack.name, srcip, dstip, protocol_id, source_zone, interface, action
